clinical_study.brief_title: Pharmacological Study of Cefazolin Antibioprophylaxis in Liver Transplantation
clinical_study.official_title: Pharmacological Study of Cefazolin Antibioprophylaxis in Liver Transplantation

brief_summary.textblock: This study describes Cefazolin pharmacokinetics variation to target levels during liver transplantation.

detailed_description.textblock:
Cefazolin is one of the many drugs used in antibiotic prophylaxis during liver transplantation. However there are no study describing its pharmacokinetics during liver transplantation.
Due to the severe pharmacokinetics interactions caused by both prior hepatopathy and surgical techniques we suppose that Cefazolin blood levels are very different from those targeted for antibiotic prophylaxis.
This study aim to describe pharmacokinetics of Cefazolin during liver transplantation in order to adapt antibiotic prophylaxis strategy in case of unadapted measured levels.

primary_outcome.description: Cefazolin blood concentration will be measured at the moment of surgical incision and every hour until end of surgery

secondary_outcome.measure: Assess correlations between Cefazolin blood concentration and CHILD-PUGH score
secondary_outcome.description: Patient's CHILD-PUGH score before transplantation

secondary_outcome.measure: Assess correlations between Cefazolin blood concentration and MELD score
secondary_outcome.description: Patient's MELD score before transplantation

secondary_outcome.measure: Assess correlations between Cefazolin blood concentration and Cirrhosis etiology
secondary_outcome.description: Cause of cirrhosis

secondary_outcome.measure: Assess correlations between Cefazolin blood concentration and Transplantation indication
secondary_outcome.description: Cause leading to transplantation

secondary_outcome.measure: Assess correlations between Cefazolin blood concentration and Transjugular intrahepatic portosystemic shunt (TIPS)
secondary_outcome.description: Medical history of TIPS

secondary_outcome.measure: Assess correlations between Cefazolin blood concentration and Creatinine
secondary_outcome.description: Creatinine levels will be measured before transplantation

secondary_outcome.measure: Assess correlations between Cefazolin blood concentration and Hemodialysis
secondary_outcome.description: Patient needing hemodialysis before liver transplantation

secondary_outcome.measure: Assess correlations between Cefazolin blood concentration and Albumin
secondary_outcome.description: Albumin levels will be measured before transplantation

secondary_outcome.measure: Assess correlations between Cefazolin blood concentration and Surgery duration
secondary_outcome.description: Time of surgical incision and end of the surgery will be noted

secondary_outcome.measure: Assess correlations between Cefazolin blood concentration and Portal vein clamping time
secondary_outcome.description: Time of portal vein clamping and declamping during realization of vascular anastomosis will be noted

secondary_outcome.measure: Assess correlations between Cefazolin blood concentration and Ascitis
secondary_outcome.description: Volume of ascitis drained at the beginning of surgery

secondary_outcome.measure: Assess correlations between Cefazolin blood concentration and Urine output
secondary_outcome.description: Volume of urine output during surgery

secondary_outcome.measure: Assess correlations between Cefazolin blood concentration and Blood loss
secondary_outcome.description: Blood loss quantification will be done throughout surgery

secondary_outcome.measure: Assess correlations between Cefazolin blood concentration and Red cell transfusion unit
secondary_outcome.description: The number of red cell units transfused during transplantation will be counted at the end of surgery

secondary_outcome.measure: Assess correlations between Cefazolin blood concentration and Platelet transfusion unit
secondary_outcome.description: The number of platelet units transfused during transplantation will be counted at the end of surgery

secondary_outcome.measure: Assess correlations between Cefazolin blood concentration and Plasma transfusion unit
secondary_outcome.description: The number of plasma units transfused during transplantation will be counted at the end of surgery

secondary_outcome.measure: Assess correlations between Cefazolin blood concentration and Intraoperative blood salvage
secondary_outcome.description: Intraoperative blood salvage transfusion volume during surgery

secondary_outcome.measure: Assess correlations between Cefazolin blood concentration and Crystalloid infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Assess correlations between Cefazolin blood concentration and Volume of crystalloid infusion during surgery

secondary_outcome.measure: Assess correlations between Cefazolin blood concentration and Colloid infusion
secondary_outcome.description: Volume of colloid infusion during surgery

secondary_outcome.measure: Assess correlations between Cefazolin blood concentration and Basal cardiac index
secondary_outcome.description: Cardiac index value at the beginning of surgery

secondary_outcome.measure: Assess correlations between Cefazolin blood concentration and Minimal cardiac index
secondary_outcome.description: Minimal index value during surgery

secondary_outcome.measure: Assess correlations between Cefazolin blood concentration and Surgical site infection
secondary_outcome.description: Number of patient with surgical site infection in the 28 days post-surgery

arm_group.description: Patient undergoing liver transplant surgery and receiving antibiotic prophylaxis with Cefazolin

study_pop.textblock: All patient receiving Cefazolin as perioperative antibiotic prophylaxis during liver transplantation.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age over 18
- patient undergoing liver transplantation
- receiving Cefazolin as perioperative antibiotic prophylaxis to prevent surgical site infections
Exclusion Criteria:
- pregnant women
- legal protection or protected adults
- ongoing antibiotic treatment before liver transplantation
- patient inability to receive information or express opposition to the study.
- patient refusing participation

facility.name: Surgical intensive care unit, University Hospital, Tours
